Overview   Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help

Package modnlp.tc.dstruct

Interface Summary
TCInvertedIndex Inverted indices for text categorisation must implement this interface.
 

Class Summary
BagOfWords Store number of tokens indexed by types
BVProbabilityModel Store inverted indices of terms and categories (indexed to documents) which form the basis of a probability model.
CorpusList List of filenames (full path) in the corpus
IdFrequencyPair Represent a doc id and the number of times a term (in BVProbabilityModel) occurs in it
NewsItemAsBooleanVector Store text as an array of booleans, its id and categories (also as a vector)
NewsItemAsOccurVector Store text as an array of integers (each representing the number of times a term occurs in the text), its id and categories (also as a vector).
ParsedCorpus Store ParsedDocuments.
ParsedDocument Store text (as a StringBuffer), its id (as a String), and the categories to which it belongs (as a vector)
ParsedNewsItem Deprecated. Use ParsedDocument instead.
ParsedText Deprecated. Used ParsedCorpus instead
Probabilities Record a 4-entry joint probability table for (Boolean) random vars term and category as well as the priors for p(term) and p(category)
SetOfWords Term set for text
StopWordList List of stop words to be removed
TCProbabilityModel Define methodos to be implemented by all probability models for text categorisation.
TSReducedText Store NewsItemAsOccurVector's, handle conversions to a variety of formats (just plain strings and ARFF, at the moment, actually) N.B.: TSReducedText is usually BIG! (so use with caution, unless you have lots of memory to spare).
WordFrequencyPair Represent a term and the number of times it occurs
WordScorePair Represent a term and its double-precision flot score
